chat_history.content: Hi there! Please brainstorm three compelling story ideas for a 250-word Common App “challenge” essay, then outline the strongest idea in five parts (hook, context, conflict, growth, reflection).
Brainstorm three story ideas for a “challenge” essay, then outline the best one.
I'm here to help you with your essay. What specific aspect would you like to work on? I can help with brainstorming ideas, creating outlines, drafting, revising, or polishing your essay.
Brainstorm three unique challenge-focused story ideas.
Brainstorm three story ideas for a “challenge” ive faced in my life" essay. i want to talk about the time i had a rough time in calculus
